thread.section_title: PhysioRoom.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.physioroom.com
thread.title: JHT1

author: JHT1
title: JHT1
text: The knee brace I ordered came within 2 days which was great, however, there is a fault in the stitching and one of the bracing wires inside slips out of its sleeve and slides down my leg. This happened after I had worn it for 3 days so according to their returns policy I can't send it back. However, the brace worked fine to support my knee and I have fixed it with sellotape. Doesn't look great though, and isn't a good advert for the company.
